Consider the following points when SMAPI is used:  VSMGUARD must always be used to start SMAPI, regardless of whether the system is running in a Unified Resource Manager environment.  A Directory Manager license is not required. If a Directory Manager is not purchased and installed, a "SMAPI USE ONLY" instance of DirMaint is installed and configured.  A Performance Toolkit license is not required. SMAPI installs and configures a "SMAPI USE ONLY" instance of the Performance Toolkit to obtain performance data for use in provided SMAPI APIs. 10.5.1 Who needs SMAPI SMAPI is ideal for the following user types:  Cloud solutions, such as IBM Cloud Infrastructure Center, IBM Wave, and IBM Cloud Connector  Any Business Partner or customer who wants to provide alternative methods or access to z/VM SMAPI functions  Primarily for those that are running a IBM Z, but without IBM Z z/VM skills, which mostly are customers that are running Linux
